features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.subtitle: We make equipment rental simple, safe, and affordable for construction professionals.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Rent equipment in four simple steps

step1.title: Submit Request
step1.description: Select equipment and submit a rental request with your details.

step2.title: Admin Approval
step2.description: Our team reviews and approves your rental request.

step3.title: Make Payment
step3.description: Complete payment after approval to confirm your rental.

step4.title: Get Equipment
step4.description: Receive your equipment and start your construction project.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive range of construction equipment rental services, designed to meet all your project needs.

equipmentRental.title: Equipment Rental
equipmentRental.description: Wide range of modern, well-maintained construction equipment available for rent.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Secure platform with partner verification and admin approval process.

flexibleRental.title: Flexible Rental
flexibleRental.description: Pricing options tailored to your needs: hourly, daily, or per kilometer rates.
flexibleRental.feature1: Hourly, daily, or per km pricing

expertSupport.title: Customer Support
expertSupport.description: Complete assistance to help you choose the right equipment and answer all your questions.

nationwide.title: Nationwide Coverage
nationwide.description: Present in all major cities to serve you closer to home.
